subject: Steroids
Suits and Litigation
Perjury
lead_paragraph: Unless the government has an undisclosed eyewitness who saw Barry Bonds receive injections or heard him admit to steroid use, this trial stacks up as a classic credibility contest.
snippet: Unless the government has an undisclosed eyewitness who saw Barry Bonds receive injections or heard him admit to steroid use, this trial stacks up as a classic credibility contest.
